text: Cardi B has many naked pics circulating on the Internet — both confirmed and rumored — due to her stripper past. But leaking a “ sex tape ” with her fiancé Offset right after leaking a nude video? This might be a little too much for the Internet to handle. When it comes to setting social media alight, Cardi B seems to always know what she is doing. Working on a new single and want it to come out with a spark? Leak a nude video as an appetizer, and then watch your single climb up the Billboard charts! Want to shut down the cheating rumors circulating around your beau? Leak a celeb sex tape with the guy!
